name: FastText Vector Processor
description: Loads pre-trained fastText models and uses them to induce a vector for a sentence.

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: The name of the model to load from disk

parameters.name: tokens_field
parameters.description: The field containing the tokens that form the sentence to convert to a vector

parameters.name: learn_rate
parameters.description: The learning rate

parameters.name: learn_rate_update_rate
parameters.description: Updates for the learning rate

parameters.name: vector_size
parameters.description: Size of the word vectors

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: Size of the context window

parameters.name: epochs
parameters.description: The number of epochs

parameters.name: min_count
parameters.description: The minimum occurrence count of a word

parameters.name: min_count_label
parameters.description: The minimum occurrence count of a label

parameters.name: negative
parameters.description: Number of negatives sampled

parameters.name: word_n_grams
parameters.description: Max length of the word N-grams

parameters.name: loss_name
parameters.description: Loss function name (ns, hs, softmax)

parameters.name: ft_model_name
parameters.description: Name of the fastText model to use (cbow, sg, sup)

parameters.name: buckets
parameters.description: Number of buckets to use

parameters.name: min_n_gram
parameters.description: Minimum length of the character N-grams

parameters.name: max_n_gram
parameters.description: Maximum length of the character N-grams

parameters.name: threads
parameters.description: The number of threads to use

parameters.name: sampling_threshold
parameters.description: The sampling threshold

parameters.name: label_prefix
parameters.description: The prefix used for labels

parameters.name: pretrained_vectors_file
parameters.description: The filename that contains the pretrained word vectors, if any. Leave blank for none
